DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted globally. The aim of the trial is to compare sequential addition of insulin aspart versus further dose increase with insulin degludec/liraglutide in subjects with type 2 diabetes mellitus, previously treated with insulin degludec/liraglutide and metformin and in need of further intensification. This is an extension to trial NN9068-3952, NCT01952145 (DUALâ„¢ V).
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Comparing Sequential Addition of Insulin Aspart Versus Further Dose Increase With Insulin Degludec/Liraglutide in Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus, Previously Treated With Insulin Degludec/Liraglutide and Metformin and in Need of Further Intensification
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec, insulin aspart drug combination
DOC.criteria: Completion (Visit 28) of NN90683952 with insulin degludec/liraglutide + metformin HbA1c (glycosylated haemoglobin) above or equal to 7 percent at Visit 27 of NN90683952 trial Clinically significant diseases of the major organ systems Screening calcitonin above or equal to 50 ng/L
